ygData.subject: Re: Knight
ygData.msgSnippet: what level were you when you took him out? and is this the end of the two token quest? this has to be another quest item... but for what? Maybe you can
ygData.messageBody:
what level were you when you took him out?
and is this the end of the two token quest?

this has to be another quest item... but for what? Maybe you can petition a gm
and trade it to have Sir added to your name?

From: "Joseph E. Nisse" <nisse@...>
To: <eqpaladin@onelist.com>
Date sent: Fri, 14 May 1999 08:24:04 -0500
Send reply to: eqpaladin@onelist.com
Subject: [eqpaladin] Knight

The other day I was looking through my inventory when I came across something that baffles me. It is an icon with a
picture of a knight on it. When I inspect it it says KNIGHT and that all classes can have it and it weights 2.0. It doesn't
say that it is a lore item and it doesn't fit in any of my body inventory slots. Anyone have any idea as to what it is? I do
not remember anyone giving it to me. I have just finished taking out Byle Bundin but I don't remember having received
the knight when I completed this quest. I got a whole 8 silvers, oh boy. Thanks for any help.

--Bruceson, 12 lvl Dwarven Paladin, Tunare server

Dan Kassiday
